item.title: What a great start to my day
item.description: Most viral edit: thanks for the upvotes my dudes! I’ve been searching for a good write up on Cheney all day and finally found one. In case you need a refresher on just what an absolutely evil motherfucker he really was: “No hell is hot enough or eternal enough for Dick Cheney. Any discussion of his works must begin with the 2021 assessment of Brown University’s Costs of War Project that found, conservatively, that the War on Terror killed between 897,000 and 929,000 peopleacross five of its battlefields. Codirector Neda Crawford called that assessment “a vast undercount,” since it doesn’t take into account the downstream casualties caused by the epidemiological effects of destroying the infrastructure of the countries Cheney helped bomb, invade, and occupy. Cheney shares the blame for what is surely the deaths of more than a million people with many others, especially George W. Bush, the president he served. But while Bush was the self-styled “decider,” Cheney was the most crucial architect the War on Terror had, shaping the decisions Bush made.” Source: https://www.thenation.com/article/politics/dick-cheney-war-on-terror-executive-power/

26 Imgur Creator Spotlight: @PaintMags painted this! They've got a TON of other ones they've done in their posts. Go check 'em all out. Awesome stuff. Love it.
27 Man Tax: Alessandro Dellisola
“Folks don’t like to have somebody around knowin’ more than they do. It aggravates ‘em.” - Harper Lee, To Kill a Mockingbird I try to keep my posts "good vibe zones". So, instead of finding the one thing in here you don't like and commenting only on that, also comment about something you DID like. Balance the negativity. Love you long time. So, I made a discord server. It's a relaxed environment where you can take/donate memes to the cause, play trivia twice a week, chat about lots of topics or about nothing at all. We also have Jack Box game night and are setting up movie night! Very laid back/relaxed vibe. Come hang with us. https://discord.gg/AWFV7FT3RQ I'm also on the imgcat server for updates & fun: https://discord.gg/TpjD37jgJ9 ***Also if you miss abbiistabbii's discord community good news! You can now find it here https://discord.gg/qeCygcnWy8 - where everyone's reconnecting, shitposting, and hanging out again*** https://ko-fi.com/mememuseumcurator Unable to work and pretty destitute. Feel free to leave me a tip. Those that have, y'all are the bee's knees. You've helped me so much. ***Tag me if you see an artist/creator you like whose work isn't getting seen as much as it should be! Or if you are an artist/creator and want me to post something of yours, DM me!

item.title: threatening to read the names on the Epstein list! Do it!
item.description: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene says she plans to read names from the Epstein list on the House floor, where members are protected from lawsuits for what they say during official sessions. Greene stated that once Congress resumes business, she intends to use that platform to expose powerful individuals connected to Jeffrey Epstein’s trafficking network, which she claims includes “people on both sides.” Her pledge comes during one of the longest government shutdowns in U.S. history, as public pressure for transparency in the Epstein case continues to grow. Whether she follows through, and how congressional leaders respond if she does, could become one of the most significant moments in Congress related to the Epstein files. The House floor remains the only place in America where a member can legally say those names without fear of defamation lawsuits.

item.title: Mouse, killed by bees and covered in Propolis
item.description: A tiny mouse can be drawn to a beehive by the irresistible scent of honey and the warmth inside. Hungry or seeking shelter, it dares to sneak in… not realizing this choice will be its last. Once the bees sense the intruder, they immediately defend their home — attacking with fierce unity until the mouse’s life ends. But the real challenge begins after the danger is gone. The mouse’s body is too large to remove from the hive. And this is where the bees reveal their instinctive genius. Rather than leaving the body to decay and spread disease, they seal it completely with a special substance they make — **propolis**. ? Made from tree resin and beeswax, propolis is: • Antibacterial and antifungal • Moisture-resistant and preservative • A perfect natural sealant Layer by layer, the bees encase the mouse in propolis, turning it into a harmless, mummified relic within the hive — no odor, no infection, no chaos.

item.title: You Don’t Need to Tell Us How We’d Be Murdered
item.description: First, I get where this comes from - people want to express how dangerous it is for queer and trans folks in some parts of the world. When I posted my Queen of Dubai story this morning, a bunch of folks decided to “warn” me by listing in graphic detail how I supposedly would have died if I’d gone to Dubai. Stuff like “you would’ve been trafficked,” “beheaded,” “r*ped and murdered.” https://imgur.com/gallery/i-was-almost-queen-of-dubai-D41Yu8i Here’s the sad thing: I already know how dangerous it is to be queer or trans - in Dubai, and in plenty of other places, including my own country. What shocked me about this post this morning isn’t that reality, it’s how casually people seemed to think it’s okay to describe my hypothetical death to me. When you tell a queer or trans person, in detail, how they’d die for existing, it doesn’t raise awareness - it just reminds us how fragile our safety already is. It might feel like allyship, but it lands as fear. This clip was from a longer YouTube Q&A video from Tumblr, where someone asked me, “What’s the most ridiculous thing anyone has ever asked you?” The Queen of Dubai story was my answer - and the subtext was always: I know exactly how dangerous that offer was. That’s why I didn’t do it. But on another level, my point was: how insane is the internet that an offer like that was actually a thing. https://youtu.be/tMdDB3-1SGw Seeing so many people rush to describe my imagined death made me realize something: even people who think they’re being supportive sometimes don’t realize how heavy their words are. I’ll admit, I also need to be a little more careful about context - clips pulled from longer conversations can lose the nuance that was there in the moment, but the hope is always to strike up conversation, or provide content that can be interacted with elsewhere - but it's a clip, it's never going to have full context. I will be more thoughtful about which clips I post going forward, but I also hope people take this as a gentle reminder: if your heart is in the right place, show it through care, not horror. We don’t need to be told how we’d be murdered. We need to be told we matter enough to keep living.

item.title: 21 Nice and wholesome things to brighten your day, vol 103
item.description:
An Garda Síochána ("the Guardians of the Peace") is the national police and security service of the Republic of Ireland. It is more commonly referred to as the Gardaí ("Guardians" or "the Guards").
note found in an old vinyl record
"I was staying in the Hilton hotel in Riyadh for several weeks for work, and my hotel room cleaner from Nepal left me a towel animal. I left him a note asking if he could leave it there the next time he cleaned my room, and he did. And over several weeks the collection kept growing until the day I checked out. Such a nice highlight to my extended stay and I left him a little hamper of snacks and a tip to say thankyou (there was actually at least six more animals he made but they slowly lost their shape over time)." ~u/wehaveavisual Our fellow Imgurian Sergio is in need. https://imgur.com/gallery/9Gzg1mb Help him out here: https://ko-fi.com/sergio73090
item.dc:creator: hoopsnek

item.title: GovBrief Today #277
item.description: Tuesday is Election Day and our chance to begin restoring the norms we once lived under. In the less than ten months since he's taken office, Donald Trump ordered attacks on 16 unarmed boats near South America that killed dozens of people. He has threatened Venezuela, Nigeria, Panama, Greenland, and Canada. The self-dealing and grift we've seen from Trump rivals that of the most corrupt times in our history. Federal authoritarianism only works when it's supported from below. That's how 25% of ICE arrests happen in Texas and how Trump aide Stephen Miller got Virginia State Police to seize an activist's phone over pamphlets she distributed to neighbors. Everywhere you see federal overreach, it's enabled by local cooperation. You can change that starting today. We see daily proof of all of these things and more. Today is the day to vote for the world you want to live in because the officials you elect today either cooperate with authoritarianism or stand against it. Notice you're seeing less news on social media? We track the data - you're right. Social media networks are suppressing news stories more every day. Want to stop missing what matters? Get every brief in your inbox, 7 nights a week. Data, images, searchable archive. Free and private at govbrief.today. #GovBriefToday #Resist Subscribe (It's Free!) - https://gbounacos.substack.com [1] https://go.govbrief.today/stephen-miller-activist-complaint [2] https://go.govbrief.today/chicago-ice-human-rights [3] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-cuts-food-aid [4] https://go.govbrief.today/usda-snap-discounts-unlawful [5] https://go.govbrief.today/utah-redistricting-legal-challenge [6] https://go.govbrief.today/loomer-pentagon-press [7] https://go.govbrief.today/dc-sandwich-thrown-agent [8] https://go.govbrief.today/ice-arrests-texas-25pct [9] https://go.govbrief.today/head-start-centers-closing [10] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-endorses-cuomo [11] https://go.govbrief.today/ballroom-donors-conflict-interest [12] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-binance-pardon-partner [13] https://go.govbrief.today/student-debt-forgiveness-lawsuit Subscribe (It's Free!) - https://gbounacos.substack.com
item.dc:creator: GeorgeBounacos

item.title: The last piece of my 3D printed suit of 16th century armor
item.description:
My hobby? I design 3D printed plate armor templates for people to craft at home. This is the final piece of the puzzle, which turned out fantastic in my opinion. Super comfortable to wear!
I only have a single greave+sabaton completed, so I need to make the right leg to complete the photoshoot.
The leather lacing on the inside of the greave is historical - you'll find this type of fastening on armor suits circa the end of the 16th century. Check out Peffenhauser's works, as well as Jakob Topf.
If you want to 3D print yourself a full suit of armor, check out my Etsy! https://nicoprintedantiques.etsy.com
The back of the boot is slotted to allow for horseback riding spurs, which I did not include unfortunately.
item.dc:creator: Vonschlippe

item.title: I’ll forever miss you mom. FUCK CANCER!!!!!
item.description: I’m not sure how to make this post…. It is with the heaviest of hearts and most broken of souls, we have to say goodbye to the most amazing woman I’ve ever known in my life. My mom passed away Saturday morning after a valiant battle with cancer. My Mom was the center of soo many people worlds. She was there if you needed someone to hug you when you down or pump you up when you needed that extra bit of support. She had a way of gathering people to her, and making them see the best in themselves. Thank you for giving me the absolute best 46 years of my life. Thank you for taking care of me and dad, and Mel as lovingly as you did. I will miss to the moon and back. And I will take care of dad for you like I promised. EDIT: Truly thank you all for you amazingly kind words. I’m sitting here crying and reading them. Thank you for saving me tonight.
item.dc:creator: mentalproblemz

item.title: Return of the Meme: 1515 (double depression)
item.description:
Let's get this bread.
Always a goal.
Wouldn't be a post of mine without something this extremely niche.
Thinking about dating again, but only when I have enough in my savings for the sword I want to get. That way I can get a sword instead of trying to put myself out there on dating apps. I'm a spicy esoteric person with a lot of baggage that's well-packed and examined, and not the kind of person most people want in their lives romantically, and I get it. I'm lonely, sure, but not alone. Definitely thirsty though, which is a bit of an issue. But I get attached too fast, and without any logic as to how things should go, as a recent experience taught me, and that's a royal pain in the ass problem that I'm not sure how to solve--or can be solved. Anyway, I digress.
The last thing a baby dinosaur sees before being swallowed.
This is actually a Common Grackle. Grackles always look more judgemental than crows.
So many dark places, really.
A reference to events in Genesis.
Both.
....yeah. this is me.
Pippin tax! Today's message from Pippin: "you're a good boy. Vrrrrrrrrrr. Mrrrrvvvvvvrrrrrrr." ______ 1) Are you on the run to a safe place and passing through Arizona on your way to safer grounds? My apartment is open to you to crash at, and it is a safe space. Pippin and I will make you a meal and gladly share tea, wine, or mead with you. 2) Hey! Take your meds with a full glass of water, please. Do it for Pippin, or Space Mom, or better yet, do it for yourself. 3) Ĝefeloað wē. We will carry on. 4) all funds from the sales of items at these two links will be sent to support charities aiding to fight for Trans rights in the US (not just T-shirts!) https://www.teepublic.com/t-shirt/74812801-all-conures-are-anarchists https://www.teepublic.com/t-shirt/74811778-whiptail-pride 5) Since multiple people have requested this over the last two weeks or so, my ko-fi is: https://ko-fi.com/codyandpippin
